```{r}
#Created Variables x and y assigned to 3 and 4 respectively
x=3
y=4
print(c(x,y))
```

```{r}
x+y  #Addition
x-y  #Subtraction
x*y  #Multiplication
x/y  #Division
x^y  #Powers
x%%y #Modulus (x mod y)
```

```{r}
log(x)   #Logarithm of x
abs(x-y) #Absolute value of x-y
exp(x)   #e^x
```
